name: Mehery Soccom Private Limited
description:
Mehery Smart Conversations is a multi-channel customer engagement platform that supports both inbound customer interactions and outbound marketing automation.

Supported Channels: WhatsApp Business, Facebook Messenger, Instagram DM, Telegram, Web Chat, App Chat, Email, and SMS.

Marketing Automation: Launch scheduled outbound campaigns and track CTA responses in real-time for optimized engagement.

Conversational AI: Seamlessly integrates with OpenAI and Azure OpenAI, enabling you to define bot behavior, leverage trained models, and integrate with backend systems to fetch user-specific data—creating dynamic and engaging customer conversations.

Customer & Lead Management: Manage customer relationships and leads across social engagements with ease.
focus_areas: Campaign Management. Create, personalise and schedule or launch WhatsApp campaigns effortlessly, with your customer cohorts.
Lead Management. Easily capture and nurture leads across social media, transforming initial interest into loyal customers.
Conversation Management. Cross-channel customer profiling, session tags, follow-ups and appointment booking—all work seamlessly together
